title: Game running at x4 speed glitch
body:
Ok riot, I am so confused right now. After editing some videos for my youtube channel and using 'BaronReplays' to go back over game clips and looking for highlights using the x4 speed features to stop myself from having to watch the entire match; and now for some reason the game actually still thinks I am playing at x4 speed. Some of the things that were happening were somewhat like that, but 4 times as fast; For example when I would click anywhere to move my character would run there in 2 or 3 seconds but the white line on the minimap would take a while to catch up, another thing that would happen is my character would 'get to' the creeps in the jungle camp and I could see the spot where it is but nothing is there (they would only spawn once the white line on the minimap has caught up. Animations, Auto attacks, missiles and my (and everything else on the map that moves (players, minions, dragon, minion camps etc.)) would go ridiculously fast. Also the clock would be 4 times as fast but keep jumping back to where it should be, The 'match found' clock was also 4 times as fast aswel.

Has anyone else had this error, Anyone have any insights or fixes; Ive put a lot of time (and money) into this game and would not like to simply not be able to play 

Im currently uploading a clip and will link it when it uploads, it shows what I'm trying to explain really well

{{item:3070}} {{champion:32}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Hey SSuperduperFlyy,

I suggest performing a [client repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues). Let me know if that helps.

-DTN

It turns out it was something to do with the actual computer clock, so I did a commant to fix it on cmd; Thanks deep terror nami for your interest in my problem but it turns out I've probably changed something myself *doh* 
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
Thanks for the update. If someone else has this issue in the future I may be able to use this to help them :3

Its like this video 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wDzDSVHyl08
But sped up instead
